Summary: My mom and I stayed for five days while we were in the area visiting family. We were very happy with our stay. Everything was very clean. Our room was comfortable, the breakfast was good, service was excellent from everyone. We will definitely stay here on future visits.

Summary Heading: Amazing staff makes for a great stay
Summary: This hotel was phenomenal. It was clean and well maintained. We were treated well, and every staff member took the extra step of engaging with our five year old. It was impressive. The staff in this hotel is working hard and not missing a beat. We also appreciated the quality and variety of the well stocked breakfast. This is a perfect option for a trip to Knotts Berry Farm or the surrounding area.

Summary Heading: Great place, great staff, great location
Summary: Spent a two half days and one night in Palm Springs with my wife. We needed a restful, relaxing time in between meeting venues and this was exactly what we hoped for. Wonderful accommodations and great location.

Whenever I needed a printer, they were super nice to help me. In general, this hotel was very clean. And I enjoyed their breakfast specially coffee. Finally, they fixed the other elevator so more waiting

Stayed here for our last three nights on our last US trip. It’s a nice clean modern hotel and that still has free parking. The breakfast was good here, in some Hampton hotels the breakfast offering can be very poor now, standards are dropping as prices rise. Staff were nice too and property was well kept.

I have been staying in Hampton Inns for 20+ years, and they've all been a good experience, which is why I keep staying at them. However, the Hampton Inn in Buena Park was exceptional. The hotel was beautiful and clean, and the staff was wonderful - pleasant, professional, and very helpful. My teenage son and I stayed in a two-queen suite, which was beautifully designed, roomy, quiet, and very comfortable. The breakfast was also good, with a nice selection. We highly recommend this hotel.
Room tip: Room 329 (two-queen suite) - quiet, beautiful, sunny, large suite

Summary: My husband and I had a two day stay at this hotel.  We were here to visit our grandson that goes to college in Fullerton.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  The room was spacious and very clean.  We were very pleased with our stay here.  The hotel is very clean and easy access to the interstate.  Would highly recommend this place.

Clean hotel from lobby to rooms.  comfortable bed, breakfast was great had egg, toast or bagels, waffles , juice fruit  coffee hot chocolate,on front desk could buy water , sodas or frozen food if got in too late and hungry and  great attention.

Staff is iffy. They pick and choose who to be courteous to. I booked a double Queen suite with sleeper sofa and although my Mother was in a wheelchair, they gave us the smallest crappiest suite in the hotel. Guests are allowed to smoke weed outside in pool area. We felt uneasy. We traveled for our son’s junior concert as a music major. Couch cushions were torn and whoever had the room before is smoked. The thermostat was dangling crooked on the wall. No water pressure in the shower. The only reason we remained at the hotel was because it’s close to the university.

Summary Heading: Great Experience, Just Be Mindful of All Ears
Summary: pon checking in, my family and I were greeted, acknowledged as Diamond Members, and welcomed back as returned guests. The staff was friendly and helpful. Our room and the rest of the hotel we saw, were clean and nice. We enjoyed our one-night stay and rested well.  Fortunately, everyone we met was nice and helpful. I would suggest that when team members are discussing incidents involving other guests, they do so in their private office and not while at the front desk. As I entered the front desk area, a hotel team member was chatting with another speaking ill-will about her encounter with a difficult guest. She immediately stopped once she saw me, which was when I was at the desk already and heard enough. Thank you!

We arrived around 2 pm on Saturday and were greeted with a smile by Alva.  We checked in online, but Alva was able to move us to the 4th floor by my request.  Alva gave us fast, friendly and efficient service on this busy weekend. The upgraded room was very nice, clean and well located.  There was minimal road noise and noise from other rooms.

Everything I look for on a travel trip where I am not going to be in the hotel much was here. Staff was friendly and helpful. Rooms were clean. Breakfast fare was well done and supplied well. Parking lot was well lit. Market store was well stocked. Location was only 4 miles from where I need to go each day. I stayed there for 5 days and absolutely had no issues. Even the guests were polite. I will definitely stay there again when needing to be in the area.

Staff was super great, hotel was super clean and at a very convenient location. Loved the buffet breakfast and everyone was friendly and accessible. Hotel was very conveniently located. Just wish both washers worked though.

It’s close to many great shops and restaurants.  Everything is within 10 minutes.  The room was clean. The staff was friendly and helpful.   I’d come and stay again.  My next trip will be with my family for leisure.

We stayed in this hotel for our visits to Disneyland and Universal Studios. Distance was not a problem, especially to Disney (15 mins max) and the hotel was clean and comfortable. We may definitely stay here again.

You will not find a better place to stay always clean and the staff is amazing. Breakfast is the best!!!!!! One thing I love is that everyone at this place is always so help full and willing to help with anything

Enjoyed our stay here! They upgraded our room to accommodate an extra kido. Breakfast was awesome, and the hotel was quite. Happy we found this spot foe our trip to Disneyland and Knotts berry farm. The drive was only 5 minutes to either location!

Highly recommend this hotel!!  Will go back at anytime. Good treatment, excellent breakfast, clean, and close to freeway. Family was really happy staying here. Checking was also really fast. Hope everything stays the same for our next trip.

Summary Heading: Great lace to stay near amusement parks
Summary: Great service. Clean hotel. Breakfast was decent and well stocked. Great location near parks. Some noise from elevators could be heard early in the morning as we had a room right off the elevators. Would try to get a different location next time for this reason.

Summary Heading: A Wedding party, excellent accommodating staff and facilities!
Summary: In for a quick Wedding party stay for several days. Very accommodating to bride and groom and guests. Made sure our daily cleaning schedule was accurate and often and asked for any other assistance they could provide me.I was pleased with their service and left a $20 tip for housekeeping. Overall, a very well organized and well run hotel.

Summary Heading: Great room and great customer service
Summary: Everyone was very friendly and welcoming and the room was nice and clean and great location we had forgotten a couple of things and the front desk took care of us which was super nice we had a great time and will be staying here again

Stayed here due to its proximity to Knotts berry farm. Walls are literally paper thin. So thin that we were kept up by one neighbors tv at normal level and phone conversation like he was sitting in our room. And then woken up at 5am by our other neighbor having multiple rounds of sex with someone. When complaining to the front desk of what was going on the girl knew exactly who was in the room next to us- making me believe this is known lady of the night using the room next to us. They told us they were going to ask her to leave immediately. But not before having one more round of sex with my kids listening. I was mortified and it was a horrible ending to a very nice trip to California.    Front desk was very apologetic but told we can contact the manager on Monday when he’s in.

Parking was easy, check in was choice of electronic or front desk, elevator, extremely sanitary and friendly staff, right off the freeway with a gas station across the street, grocery store and shopping nearby, too!

I booked this to be close to my daughter in Fullerton and was nervous when I pulled up because it’s in a kind of industrial neighborhood. It was AMAZING. A 10min drive to both Disney and Knotts. The suite was MASSIVE and the price was amazing. It was so clean and there was a huge breakfast. Will absolutely stay here again! We only stayed one night but I was very VERY impressed.

One of the nicest Hamptons inns we've stayed at.  It felt new or recently remodeled.  Location was centrally located and had benefits that hotels closer to Disney didn't offer, like free parking and breakfast.  Staff was friendly.  This was the nicest of the 3 hotels we visited during our stay in SoCal and one of the most reasonably priced.  Not much around the hotel, but everything you need is accessible within a few minute drive. Highly recommend.

I stay at many hotels.  The difference here starts when you check in.  Attitude tells a lot and starts at the front desk.  Small things like extra room coffee, can we get in early, etc. puts this place on top of my search when I return to this area.  It's just better.

The hotel has very clean rooms and the staff does everything to keep the rooms, hallways and pool area sanitized. The Hampton also has Great and friendly staff that are there for your every need and accommodates you as much as possible. Not to mention those comfy beds and pillows

This is in no way to toot my own horn but only to give credibility to my comment - I was a business and hospitality major and have been humbly successful in my line of work.  When I first called about special parking accommodations, I could have turned away and gone to another hotel.  However, Alba stopped me and took the time to ask me further details in order to try and accommodate my needs.  That simple effort showed she wasn't just a Hilton/Hampton employee but someone who actually takes the time to drive business through care.  That simple effort also brought her hotel a total of 4 nights of stay from two different visits from me as a customer with intents to return in the future as well.  Another gentleman I'd like to highlight is Jae.  I checked in late during my second

Overall, this was a great hotel that exceeded our expectations!  Great to see hot breakfast return again.  Only concern was some guests walking around in common areas and in elevators without masks when required.  Not sure if staff reminded those guests of their policy so this did not affect their rating.

Our room was clean and organized! The included breakfast was a hit. The pool was so much fun! Staff were friendly, happy and willing to assist us during breakfast or entering the hotel. I highly recommend

Wonderful property, updated and clean. We stayed for 2 nights and location was perfect for Knott’s Berry Farm and Disneyland. The staff were very friendly and greeted us, we felt very welcomed. Can’t wait to visit again in the fall!

Walls are paper thin. You can hear everything going on above you and below you. You can hear everything going on outside your room as well. Super noisy hotel! The breakfast buffet is disappointing. They “run out of food” early and when you ask if anymore is coming out, you’re told “it’s coming out soon.” It then doesn’t and you’re left there waiting and disappointed. Plenty of other choices around there. Look elsewhere.

Great value with a convenient location.  Service was also very friendly and helpful  Pool maintenance was questionable but addressed timely.  Also had a bad experience with a staff member providing pool entry to a friend who's child was out of control.

My room was not ready upon arrival, I was being charged a different amount from what my reservation stated. The pool was closed three days out of the 5 days we were there. My room was not cleaned when I requested even though I called front desk early in the morning. The breakfast buffet style they have set up was good but guest have to make their own waffles which would make everyone else wait in line wish they would of had them cooked and ready to go for the guest. Also one of the beds was broken, little black bugs in the closet and some kind of like nats flying around in the room. The people upstairs from us kids were jumping and stomping while we were trying to sleep this was two nights. Over all it was OK

Excellent stay! Will choose this location again. Superbly clean, wonderful staff, all needs meet and exceeded. Great atmosphere and could absolutely not ask for more. Really appreciated all the kindness and service with a smile! Will come back again!

Clean rooms, great staff service. Modern furnishings inside the room. Restrooms were clean, ice machine was clean too! Complementary breakfast was great. Hotel is in a great location, just a block or so from freeway

A great place to rest in between SOAK CITY and KNOTT BERRY FARM parks.  The swallow pool was fantastic for small children and the jacuzzi was big enough for relaxing from head to toe. Complementary breakfast was disappointing due to the waffle station being out of order per posted sign.

Summary Heading: Excellent friendly staff. Hot buffet style breakfast is back!
Summary: The night agent was extremely friendly and helpful, he made our stay great. Breakfast - Morning #1 was served to us in a to go box, which was disappointing. Morning #2 - Hot buffet style was open with waffles, hot potatoes, bagels, etc. - it was a very welcome surprise for our family!

We stayed here at one of their two queens suites from 6/23 to 26 to visit family nearby and also celebrate our anniversary with two kids. Rikin at the front desk was very attentive and tried to accommodate our needs. The hotel is located right next to the highway but we had no issue with noise from the highway. But, people who stayed right above us made a lot of noise while the kids were running around. We didn't complain since we also had kids. Otherwise, it was a great stay. The ladies at the Breakfast were nice and they changed the menu slightly different every day.  We would stay here again definitely.

A three night stay to visit family and friends. Very clean hotel, friendly and attentive staff. I would stay here again, I thought the freeway would be loud, but it wasn't a problem. If you are looking for a central location to Disneyland or Knott's Berry Farm, this is a great choice.

Friendly service and the rooms were very clean and very comfortable. We stayed the night before going to Knott’s Before Farm which is very close. If we are in the area again we will stay here again and recommend it to others.

Great customer service very attentive front desk clerks and the property is very nice and the rooms are very clean and nice and big rooms me an my family loved this property will definitely recommend it and will definitely be booking again when we go to Disneyland in the summer.

Clean , friendly and safe! No complaints whatsoever! Clean rooms, friendly staff, excellent safety protocols and clean safe environment. This was our 2nd time here and will definitely stay again when we are down this way.

We were in town visiting Biola University for this trip.  After leaving another hotel in La Mirada for cleanliness and noise issues, the Hampton Inn was almost perfect. The hotel is modern and clean and we enjoyed the extra space we had in a suite. I thought the newer construction would help minimize the noise from surrounding neighbors and from the freeway (across the street) and main road but it didn't. Frequent loud exhaust from cars and motorcycles and motorcycles were disturbing to sleeping and the person in the room above me sounded like they were doing laps and dropping bar bells on the floor all night. The free breakfast was offered only to go, selections were limited, and of usual Hampton Inn mediocre quality. Still though, it was nice to not have to go out and

I absolutely would highly recommend this location to anyone looking for comfort and value I was greeted upon my arrival by a woman whom I wish I could remember her name to give her credit for being very informative and helpful prior to me staying breakfast was good and accommodations were even better I will be back soon thanks

Nice experience with the hotel, clean and beautiful. The hotel was in a nice place, well located everything nice and clean. The only thing that I can tell is the breakfast wasn’t that good enough. Thanks!

Loved it here was above expectations. Hadn’t slept so good in a long time it was worth the price. I will definitely be back when i come visit my grandmother in Cerritos. The location was very convenient

Room was clean, comfortable. Overall, the stay was comfortable, service was not as expected for Hilton; it was minimal. Almost non existent.  Front desk staff did not make eye contact on check in.  No one at the breakfast counter and the front desk didn’t bother to ask if he could assist.

So pleased with everything about my three night stay at this Hampton Property!!!!  Room. Service... location etc - all were wonderful. I will definitely return to this property and recommend it very highly!!

I did read the reviews about the thin walls and noise before booking..but booked it anyway due to location & maybe they were just super light sleepers. YES IT’S TRUE!   At least for my room, we were on the first floor corner King room & heard our neighbors talking. It was in another language so it wasn’t really eavesdropping? Haha. Even heard them while I was on the toilet. I felt like I had to whisper in my room so my neighbors couldn’t hear us because there was an echo in our room as well.   It’s funny because my room was next to an exit door on left side of the building & didn’t hear people coming in and out of the entrance/exit, but could hear our neighbor’s tv on.   We just kept the AC running all night to tune out any noise. We like it cold anyway. It was like a white

Not only is this a high quality hotel, their staff is amazing as well. They are truly accommodating and ethical. When faced with the COVID-19 pandemic, they issued refunds and worked with its customers to do what is best for them. They truly care about its customers, and show that they care. The overall experience for our group was great, and we had a large group. We will definitely come back to this hotel!

hope all hampton location will have same professionalism with staff and services .. please have more options with the complimentary breakfast - like bacon, boiled egg (need to be warm not cold) more fruits options

Summary Heading: Good, but do not get a room near the elevator!
Summary: This is a typical Hampton Inn. It is in the newer side, but smaller since it is not as popular a location. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Staff was friendly and efficient. My biggest complaint is the noise. First, I checked in via the app and was assigned a room based on the app’s recommendation. I didn’t even look at where it was. We were placed near the elevator and could hear it going up and down and doors dinging whenever they opened on our floor. Also, the walls/ceilings are paper thin. We had some heavy footed individuals above us that would go back and forth for about an hour at a time. We even heard the guy next door sneezing. Needless to say, our sleep could have been more restful if it weren’t for the noise.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review the Hampton Inn and Suites Buena Park. We hope you enjoy the rest of your day and come back to visit soon.

Summary: Great place. The hotel was clean and the staff was friendly. Excellent breakfast. There was good variety and the staff kept things clean and well stocked. The kids wanted to swim, so we enjoyed the hot tub. The pool was too cold. Wish it had been heated.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to review us. We are so honored by the perfect score. Please come back soon. We want intelligent, savvy and kind individuals like yourself here all the time. People like you make the world a better place to live and work. Thank you!

Summary: This was a couples trip. We did some good hiking and the location is always great and easy access to both the Beaches and Los Angeles area. We actually seen an empty freeway which was great 🙂 and rare. Excellent customer service, awesome room, great cleanliness and free parking.
Manager Response: Perfect score for a perfect person! You are awesome and so appreciated. We want a entire hotel full of incredible individuals like yourself. Please come back soon. A guest like yourself is what makes the Hampton Inn and Suites Buena Park the greatest place nearest to the happiest place on earth.

Summary: This hotel is brand new, well-equipped, very clean and serves a very good complimentary breakfast.  Beds are extremely comfortable and the HVAC works well and does not emit excessive noise.  Overall, it was a very enjoyable experience.
Manager Response: Perfect score! Score!!!! Thank you for this dose of your awesomeness today! We want guests like you everyday of the week. I will share this with the staff and they will know to keep up the great work. It's people like yourself that make the Hampton Inn and Suites Buena Park the place to be. If you haven't heard it lately, your a great person. Thank you!

Summary Heading: Newer hotel not far from Knott's Berry Farm
Summary: We stayed one night at this hotel after a visit to Knott's. The hotel looks and feels brand new. We had a large corner room that was perfect for our group. The staff was friendly and the hotel offered free breakfast. The breakfast was ok, but we felt rushed when it came time to end. They stated moving items out before it was supposed to be over. Other than that it was a nice stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave a review. We value every guest that stays with our hotel and want you to have an awesome experience. I'm sorry to hear that breakfast was being put away at the very end. We want to give everyone an opportunity to experience our full complementary breakfast. Located at the Front Desk we also have a complementary "On the Go" bags for our late risers and guests on the move. We hope you will try us again in the future.

Summary: Honestly the hotel in itself was great! Good location, very clean and modern. The only downside for us where the walls were paper thin. I heard everything going on in the other rooms. Did not allow me to sleep. Otherwise everything was great!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We always strive to make a guest experience the best when at our property. We do apologize about any inconvenience caused by guest noise. If you have any additional questions or concerns feel free to reach out to the property. We are here for you.

Summary Heading: New Addition to the Hilton Family
Summary: New / Clean and Modern.. Supper convenient.. Stay here you can go wrong..  The new rooms have been redesigned to a modern standard and are extremely functional, with an abundance of outlets and a master off switch. New Beds .. Yes , and very comfortable!!
Manager Response: You. Are. Awesome!!!! Thank you so much for the perfect score. We are working hard to provide what a guest needs during their stay. It seems we did not fall short during yours. Can you multiply yourself and stay everyday? We want outstanding individuals like yourself here all the time. So, if you ever find yourself out our way, please stop by for a stay. After all your practically family now. We will see you next time!

Summary Heading: Don't believe everything you read! This hotel is a real gem!
Summary: I loved staying at this hotel! I loved everything about the hotel! The employees were so helpful and accommodating. I read all the reviews about the sound issues but I experienced nothing of the sorts. I didn't hear the elevators at night, I didn't experience excessive noise or thin wall issues. My husband and I even tested the sound and had no issues. The room was very clean and spacious. We really enjoyed the breakfast! I am not a big bacon person, but I am very sure that the sausage would be delicious. I can't wait to stay there again!
Manager Response: Whoa! That was awesome of you to give us a perfect score and mention our service. We are always striving to provide the best service and the things you need while on the road. We want a positive individual like yourself at our property again and again and again. We can never get enough. Please let us know if you ever need a place to stay when in our area. As long as we have a hotel YOU are always welcome in it. Enjoy your New Year and come again! Please!

Summary: Everything about this stay was exceptional. Staff was amazing, rooms were clean and beds were amazing. I typically always take my own pillow to hotels, but there was no need to use mine when theirs were just as comfy. Everything was spotless. Only thing I would upgrade is the breakfast, but i'm sure We'll be back!
Manager Response: I hope that you come back! If you give us another perfect score you can stay everyday forever! We appreciate a kind guest like yourself so much and we are absolutely thrilled to have you. Please let us know anyway we can improve our complementary breakfast so we can go from "near perfect" to "perfect". That is our goal. Thanks again and we hope to see you next time.

Summary: This hotel didn't disappoint. The room was clean. The fitness center had everything I needed for my daily workout. The breakfast was very adequate. The food selection was awesome. Overall, I would stay here again when I am in the area.
Manager Response: Perfect score! Yay! Thank you so much for your review. The team and I are working hard to make sure we are providing everything our guests need. I would hope you would come back when in the area. We could use a wonderful guest such as yourself.

Summary Heading: Found Drugs and stolen credit cards
Summary: I’m not sure who is to blame here... I checked in with no problems and as my family and I walked into our room we smelled a weird strong odor. I thought it was like a Raid or chemical cleaning odor. We were exhausted from traveling so we turned on the fan and started unpacking. I travel a lot for work and have a bed big routine check I do with the beds. I lifted the mattress and on one side I found approximately 15 debit and CC and 1 ID, on the other I found a crack pipe! I was furious! I immediately reported it to the front desk and manager and they were able to get me a new room but the weird thing was they did not seem shocked by what I found or surprised. They actually said they’ve found this before and they just shred the cards. I was not going to do hand these cards over
Manager Response: Sorry to find out what happened during your stay. We always strive to keep our property completely free of drugs or anything harmful to our guests. We want everyone to have an enjoyable stay when visiting our area. We take any illegal substance found on our premises seriously and want all of our guests to feel safe when on our property.   Again, we apologize you had to endure such a rough stay and please feel free to reach out for any additional comments or concerns. Again we thank you for choosing Hampton inn and Suites Buena Pak and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Traveled with a group of 9. Rooms were pristine. Building was obviously brand new. Staff was extremely helpful and accommodating. Breakfast was good, hot breakfast- waffle bar, bread and pastries, hot foods, cereal and oatmeal, juice, coffee, etc.

This hotel is fairly new and very nice.  The hotel was always clean, service was good and the breakfast was good.  I stayed for 11 nights for business and had no bad nights.  It is a good location if traveling for pleasure or business because it is a stones through away from Rt. 5.

Very clean hotel with friendly staff. Breakfast include many varieties and a lot of healthy options.the smoothies and fresh pressed juices were great.  Large spacious rooms and comfortable beds.  I would stay here again!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel with a good breakfast and easy access to freeway
Summary: Nice hotel with comfortable rooms and a good breakfast.  Located conveniently off of freeway.  Hotel is quite new and not too far of a drive from Disneyland.  I'd recommend it to people looking for a hotel in the area.

Summary Heading: This place is designed for computer toting travelers for sure
Summary: Beautifully clean and neat! There was this really cool television stand that had two sides with doors. The side facing the couch had 3 large sliding metal baskets which were perfect for computer bags, purse, camera etc. The side facing the bed was a cupboard perfect for rolling luggage size stuff. The television atop this stand swiveled but not all the way to the bed or to the couch for straight on viewing. The attached desk was large and had 2 USB ports as well as 2 AC outlets. Great for charging all that techie stuff that gets dragged along on a trip. The bathroom did not have shelves under the sink vanity; instead there were slide out shelves for hairdryer and toilet paper. Kinda cool if you put something there you could not forget it as easily as in a drawer. One design flaw

Very clean and comfortable. Good breakfast but could use work. Would stay here again. Pool didnt look heated but the jacuzzi was. Fire pit outside wasnt going but still nice. It rained at knotts so we tried 2 days in a row and nope!

Summary Heading: Great stay! Great staff!  Super clean hotel!
Summary: Well first of all let’s get something straight!! I read all the reviews saying this hotel was noisy or walls were like paper and Too loud to sleep! That is false! It was very quiet!  Also the rooms were very immaculate, comfortable and clean.    Again! Guests Over exaggerated on the noise level and thin walls.    Enjoy your stay! I will come back!

Room was large, very clean, and provided both a microwave and mini fridge along with a very nice seating area. Staff was friendly, and the fitness center is decently equipped and clean! Enjoyed my stay quite a bit.

Easy access from the freeway. Nice and quiet. Need to drive to restaurants but not far at all. We booked to rooms for our daughter and her family and ourselves. Very neat and clean. Welcoming and such friendly staff! Yummy breakfast too!

Very nice hotel with friendly staff. Came with three children (10,12,14) they were also happy, and enjoyed their stay. Comfortable beds and clean rooms. Breakfast was yummy and they had coffee out 24 hours. Great experience and we will be back.

We stayed here for our first trip to Disneyland. The suite was perfect for our family of 4. The staff was amazing. They even prepared breakfast to go bags for us! The hotel was clean and the breakfast had a lot of options.

Easy to find with plenty of parking outside (we never had to hunt for a space). Receptionists were always friendly and helpful and there is free coffee. Opposite reception is the breakfast area which always had plenty of seating. Breakfast is a buffet with 3 hot dishes, toast, cereal, waffles and fruit etc. There is a small swimming pool outside. We had a family room which was nice and clean with plenty of room. The hotel is a great location for Disney (15 mins), Knotts Berry Farm (10 mins)etc. We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely go back

This is only 2 miles away from my aunt’s house. If there’s gathering, this will be my go to place. It has amenities I need & free breakfast is a plus. My kids love having breakfast at Hampton Inn, that’s why if I’m with family, This is my preferred place to be out of the Hilton brands.

Newer hotel near the I-5 freeway. Hotel has everything you need.  Clean and quiet. Breakfast provides average menu and is satisfactorily prepared.  Staff was knowledgable and efficient. I would definitely stay here again.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this Hampton Inn! I asked for a room in a quiet area and noted that we were celebrating a kid's birthday. We were placed in a quiet area, and were surprised with a nice birthday decoration and snack pack. Thank you!  Location - Great location and near plenty of food options, all within 10-15 minutes away. Right off the freeway, and near car dealerships.  Parking - Plenty of parking. Well-lit parking area.  Service - Superb! From the Front Desk, to Housekeeping, to Breakfast. We experienced great service at each contact! Breakfast - This location did not have my favorite Hampton Inn yogurt Tropical Mango Smoothie. Maybe next time?  Room - Carpets were dirty. However, everywhere else was very clean. The sheets smelled new and clean as well. We had

We really enjoyed staying at the hotel and will be back when we visit our daughter again. The only negative part was that we had loud neighbors who talked to each other very early in the morning. I don't know if they were just really loud or the walls were too thin, but it was annoying. We were too tired to call and complain and after about an hour they finally left.

What a great experience. I would 100% recommend this to everyone. It's about 9min drive to knotts berry farm. They offer complimentary breakfast from 6am to 10am. They change breakfast up a little daily but everything was still so good, they serve omelets, potatoes. Sausage,frence  toast, cereals, waffles, bagels, and a few more items and desserts. We also checked out the heated pool and jacuzzi,  That was fun. We stayed in a 2 bedroom/ sofa bed suite that was extremely spacious with plenty of room and walking space for everyone. They offered free parking and sale snacks and stuff down stairs. They also have a gym and a computer room with free printing. They do change $50 deposit per stay that's 100% refundable. The hotel has only been there for about 6months so everything is

We visit this area 2-3 times a year and did a drive by when the hotel was being built. We decided to give the hotel a go and booked one of the studio suites. The room size was good, as was the bath. Well designed. Being on Artesia Blvd and so close to I-5, there was noticable road noise during the evening. Breakfast was so-so. Plenty of free parking, a plus for the area.

The hotel staff was amazing, the rooms were clean and the breakfast was delicious. We also enjoyed the pool, hot tub and fire pit. The beds and pillows were also super comfortable. We will be coming back for sure. Thank you!

My teen daughter and I stayed at this hotel for 2 nights last weekend.  This hotel is just off the freeway and next to apartments and a car dealership, but the surroundings were safe and clean.  Restaurants/Target etc. are about 5 minutes away. Check in was smooth and I was grateful for free parking and plenty of it.  I asked for an upper floor room because we are both light sleepers and they gave us a room on the 4th floor - yay!  All parts of the hotel were very clean and you can see the staff walking around to make sure everything is in order.  The room was large and the beds were very comfortable.  The bathroom was huge and the water pressure in the shower was outstanding with an adjustable shower head.  My teen daughter was super excited that one of the trial size items in

Summary Heading: Nice gem in LA area and advice to management
Summary: This is one of the nicest and cleanest Hampton Inn’s I have been to. I like the high ceilings in the room and the fresh new look. Beds are comfy! Did I mention the beds, did I? Wow these are really comfy :-) The AC is brandnew and runs smooth. Has a modern thermostat on the wall. I love that you can make the room really cold, in some hotels they don’t let you. Some people complain about noisy rooms/thin walls and hearing the elevator chimes. We are located the 2nd room from the elevator and we did test this. With the door closed we could hardly hear it. Sometimes you hear a bang or talk. But I have an advice for management. At night the AC is on AUTO, there is no way getting it on constant fan. This must be due to cost efficiency. I advise the hotel to change this policy for 2

We spent two nights at the hotel.  There were five of us, so the room was a double queen with a sofa bed.  The room was spacious and clean.  It is close to the Huntington Beach and to Knotts Berry Farm.  The full breakfast was impressive.  Staff was pleasant.

Stayed for 5 nights I at the Hampton Inn Buena Park.  Overall I cannot recommended this hotel enough. It is in a great condition, the rooms are really clean, maintained, spacious and comfortable.There is also the added bonus of a fridge and microwave in the room.  The hotel offers free WiFi and parking also.  The location is ideal for staying whilst in Los Angeles’ just off the interstate so quick and easy to get onto the main routes for the city. Huntingdon beach is also within easy access (40 min drive) and is a simple journey to make.  The staff at the hotel are friendly and engaging and try to do everything that can to make the stay even more enjoyable.  The pool outside is a nice additional as is the fire pit and seating area in the evening.  Already looking to return at

This was hands down one of the best Hampton Inns I have ever stayed in. Super clean, friendly staff, great parking, location was near everything and free breakfast! You cannot beat this Hampton. I will return again for sure!

Summary Heading: You'll get to know your neighbors
Summary: Because the walls are really thin. You will also get to enjoy the arrival chime of the elevator if your room is close enough. The hotel is very clean and new. The staff were professional and friendly. The breakfast is average.

The hotel staff were exceptional in their service and we were very moved when we found that the staff decorated the room for my kids birthday...it made us feel special and very happy. The property was very clean

Summary Heading: Couldn’t ask for a better place.
Summary: What can I say. Hilton knows how to do it!!  Clean, comfortable and modern. Room and bathroom extra clean. Beds and pillows really comfy!! Nice pool and jacuzzi. Good choices for breakfast. Excellent place to stay.

This is a very nice hotel. I highly recommend it. The interior design and finishes are nice, it’s very clean, the service was excellent, the staff was very friendly and helpful. Great place to stay in the Anaheim, Buena Park area

Wow is all I can say. Practically brand new hotel and it shows. Beds are amazing and sleeping was fantastic. Breakfast was plentiful and yummy! Would have liked to see bacon as a choice but both mornings we had sausage, links and then patties. Staff is super friendly and helpful. Washing room is reasonably priced and machines worked great!

Summary Heading: Very nice, worth the cost over other options
Summary: Stayed for a one night baseball game/LA trip. Perfect. Staff were friendly, everything was nice and clean/new, and the breakfast was fresh and great.  Pool was small (not a destination itself), but it was clean and just fine.  Overall a nice, updated hotel for a very pleasant stay.

This is a problem that this hotel simple can not compensate you for. The building is made SO thin that you can hear every toe of every single person in the room above you. I don’t completely blame the family who stayed above me because you can’t just not walk around (even though they were making a lot of noise at the latest hours of the night) I blame the people who built the hotel. If you want a good night’s rest, consider staying some place else.

The hotel has a known issue in room 403 where the hot/cold water lines were reversed in the shower but has chosen to do nothing about it. The manager makes you feel as though it's your fault and lack empathy when addressed. This place sells out as a result of the proximity to Disney so, I guess there's no need to correct the problem or listen to their guests. I am 17 year loyal Hilton Honors member so, imagine the treatment you get if you weren't a loyal member of their hotel rewards program.
Manager Response: We are sorry we were unable to provide you with the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay. We apologize for the issues in your room and will work with our maintenance team to ensure this does not happen again. If you return to our area, we hope you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: We visited  family in the area. This was a great location between venues. It was easy to get to and from all events throughout the weekend and our room was immaculate and spacious. Staff is friendly and helpful as well.

Stayed for my birthday and thoroughly enjoyed it! The room was spacious and the bed was comfortable. Breakfast was delicious and plentiful. Loved the mini waffles, omelettes and fruit! Will definitely stay again!

Friendly and helpful staff especially Chirac. Buffet breakfast was delicious and fulfilling. Room was clean and spacious. My room was near the bathrooms by the pool so if our bathroom was occupied, we could easily access the other. We were close to the pool and laundry room. All areas of the hotel were clean and still smells new!
Manager Response: Thank you for the nice word and for notice my staff members. We hope you make our hotel your home away from home.

Summary: I have stayed at a few different Hampton Inns, and have never been disappointed. This property was great. It was clean, and the rooms were very nice size. Pool was clean and the family had a great time in it. Right outside the pool is a sitting area with a fire feature, which was really cool. There were quite a few people who took advantage of that. Every staff member we interacted with was very friendly and nice. The breakfast was your typical hotel breakfast, but nice that it's not just continental, but has hot food like eggs, potatoes, bacon, sausage, and waffles. They also have complimentary coffee set up in the lobby at all hours. If you are looking for a hotel in this area, you can't go wrong with this one. Conveniently located not too far from Knott's Berry Farm, where we
Manager Response: Sorry you were disappointed but it sound like the fire pit , Breakfast and staff was good, We hope you give us a second chance to give you great service again.

Summary: We have travelled to the area a number of times and were looking for a hotel for my wife, daughter (4 years old) and myself.  The hotel had recently opened and seemed to have all the desired facilities for our stay. The room was good and clean.  The only suggestion is for an in-room safe to be added, although you can use a safe at the hotel reception area. We enjoyed the pool, hot tub and fire pit - always great for marshmallows after a day out in the area. Good selection of food available at breakfast and the available coffee through the day is a good service.  Staff at breakfast were great and friendly.  The staff were fantastic - Mike the Manager is regularly on site and visible, something key to set the culture for the excellent hotel service and staff that we encountered.

Clean room and bathrooms. Staff very friendly and breakfast was good. Easy to find hotel with good parking. Front desk was polite and helpful. Would definitely stay again if we ever return to Knott's Berry farm.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: We chose this location due to it being so close to Disneyland and only about 20 miles from LA. The hotel is clean and the staff were all helpful and courteous. The main complaint we had was the amount of noise. It could have been the thin walls, or just some very loud neighbors. We stayed for 7 nights, and we had the same neighbors next door for 5 nights. Every morning, they would wake up at 5:30 and turn on the tv full blast and yell at their kids while they run and jump. We let that pass because having 3 kids myself, I know what it's like to have to try to keep 3 kids quiet. However, when they left, we got a group of "young" adults who were loud the night they got there, and in the morning, they decided to wake us all up by blasting Darth Vaders theme, then jamming out to
Manager Response: I am sorry that the noise leave was to loud and we are looking at way to knock down the noise. We hope you come back soon so we can give you a great experience.

Summary: Great location clean good size room plenty room for family of 4 definitely going to stay here again bed was comfortable with plenty of pillows towels big variety breakfast complimentary coffee nice outside pool area
Manager Response: Thank you for staying and noticing the size of our rooms are good.

Summary: New  hotel very clean. The rooms were big and the staff very helpful the hotel is close to many attractions. Breakfast was included and features hot and cold items to choose from. Coffee is always available in the lobby. Definitely worth the money.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we hope you come back.

Summary Heading: Good base to get around LA
Summary: We stayed here for 10 nights and used the hotel as a base for our family holiday.  We really enjoyed staying here. Everything from the free WiFi, Breakfasts and the pool helped us relax and be ready for our adventures.  The hotel is perfect for getting to Disney/Knott's berry farm with Uber costs cheaper than parking.  There are some restaurants and a deli a few mins driving.  The hotel is just minutes from the freeway.  We explored the whole of LA and trips to Beverley hills, Hollywood, San Monica pier takes around 1 hr 30 mins.  There is also a gasoline station opposite the hotel. I would recommend staying at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great time and all the nice words.

Summary Heading: nice hotel but air conditioning units are unbelievably loud and noisy
Summary: new hotel in an ok location.  front office staff in afternoon shift seem to be very good.  rooms are ok but strange desk island with large lamp in the middle of the room does not work.  air conditioning is extremely loud and noisy.  the bathroom mirror is painted in an alarmingly ugly orange paint colour - yuck!

Great stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites Buena Park. Perfect location to explore Knott's Berry Farm and Medieval Times. Right off the freeway. We got a very clean room in a refurbished hotel. Room was nice and big for our family of five (2 double beds and a large pull out sofa). Pool, hot tub and fire pit was very nice. Over all great! I would definitely come back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with and so glad you enjoyed everything about our brand new hotel.

Summary: We will definitely stay at this property again. The rooms were nice size and beautiful for a week long stay with a family of 4 and the staff is top notch.   Andrea and Monica ensured breakfast was hot and always stocked, even with a sold out hotel.

Very clean hotel, friendly staff, nice breakfast, nice pool area, local grocery supplies, near plenty of shopping, grocery stores, fast food.  Close to Knotts. If we’re ever in Buena Park again, will definitely stay there.

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel - Great Staff and Great Location
Summary: We stayed at the Hampton Inn & Suites, Buena Park for one month, due to our home needing major repairs.   From the front desk staff, the housekeeping staff, the kitchen staff and the Manager Mike Thomas, we experienced nothing but helpful, friendly and courteous treatment.    The hotel is spotless and our room was kept very clean.    Our room was quiet, we never heard any other guest and very well appointed.     The daily buffet breakfast has alot of great choices, including hot dishes, such as eggs, sausage and excellent do it yourself waffles.    The kitchen staff kept everything well stocked and in over 30 days of staying there, I never experienced them running out of anything.     I would highly recommend this Hotel to anyone.   The location is right off of the 5 freeway and

Our family stayed here recently while visiting Knott’s Berry Farm. Room was very clean and comfy. Staff was very polite and quick when checking in. Plenty of towels for our party of 4. Breakfast was also great. Plenty of food and choices. Very close to Knott’s Berry Farm, shopping areas, and freeway access. We would definitely stay here again.

The staff was very friendly and helpful.  The rooms had plenty of towels.  The TV had a new kind of remote to promote cleanliness.  desk staff was very helpful with computer assistance in the business center.

Clean room, pool was very nice, breakfast was good and close to Medieval Times and Knots Berry. We love staying at the Hampton Inn. We also are a Hilton Honor Member. Good hotel to stay at with a family.

Summary Heading: Lovely Room But Noise a Nightmare
Summary: Family of 4 staying 2 nights in this hotel.  First impressions ... Check in great.  Friendly staff on reception.   Room massive with all we needed.    Breakfast ok  Shame plastic plates & cutlery.   Got to question though the quality of the construction.  Noticed on other reviews comments about the noise.  We had a nightmare on the 2nd night.  1am guests in room above get back.  Make a racket for 30 mins banging around the room.  Wife goes to find a member of staff but can't find anyone.  We go to the room & ask the guest to be quiet.  Looks like a young family letting their children run riot in the room.  Get to sleep but then at 5am woken by the traffic through the window.  We were facing the front. We did try to check in online but it did not give us an opportunity to pick a
Manager Response: Dear 411christophert,  We are very sorry we were not able to provide you with the quality of services and amenities you deserved during your recent stay. Please know that the problems encountered are not typical of our hotel and staff and will be addressed accordingly to avoid recurrence for future guests. We are always looking for ways to improve our guest experience, as your satisfaction is very important to us. Thank you again for your feedback.

Summary Heading: My stay at the Hampton Inn
Summary: I would recommend the Hampton Inn to my family and friends because of the great customer service received. I am big on customer service because I service the public as a nurse and my integrity is all I have at the end of the day.

Fantastic.  Would definitely stay here again.  Staff were fantastic.  If I could give 11 out of 10 I would.  Not far from Knotts Berry Farm and Disney.  My airline lost my bag and the hotel provided me with some toiletries which was very much appreciated

Best staff we have ever had.   Whole team, especially front desk, could not have been more accommodating.  Every single special request was met with a smile.   They really went above and beyond.  We were totally comfortable there for 9 days -- 2nd leg of a much longer trip

Summary Heading: Awesome hotel with Excellent Customer Service
Summary: My friend stay was awesome.  I would highly recommend this hotel for those travelling and would like a hotel near Disneyland and surrounding areas.  Its brand new and everyone in the hotel are so friendly.  You get the value for your money!

Double billed. Wouldn't clear "pending" from credit card for three weeks.  Unexpected $100 security deposit. Newly constructed clean hotel near major S. Calif. attraction.  Good location, prompt cleaning service and good hot breakfast.  Thin walls, snoring neighbors, kids playing in hallways and knocks on walls, but no barking dogs.  Not for business professionals.  Canceled planned future visit.
Manager Response: Dear Ken F,  We appreciate your review of your recent stay at our hotel and are very sorry you had a disappointing experience with us. We’ve addressed the issues you described with our staff. Satisfaction Guaranteed is the foundation of our brand’s promise, and your feedback helps us improve. Thank you once again for your comments.

Summary: The staff were friendly, knowledgeable, courteous, helpful and professional.  Best accommodation for this vacation. We were gone early and came back late all 5 days of our stay and it gave us the best rest at night
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your recent visit to Buena Park. We hope to see yo again rally soon.

Summary: Nice and comfortable hotel with kind and welcoming staff, especially Jesse at the front desk. The bedroom and bathroom are clean. The pillows and bedsheets don't smell. The hotel is close to the theme parks and right next to the freeway. Good breakfast service and food, too. Parking is also free!
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind words and I couldn't say it better my self. We are looking forward to see you really soon.

Summary Heading: New hotel with great service and contemporary clean room
Summary: The room is new and very clean. Design is up to date and everything is new. Complimentary breakfast. The staff is courteous and friendly. Location is ok, 5-10 min drive to Disneyland which is good for family.
Manager Response: Glad my staff made you feel comfortable during your stay. I feel we have the best staff in the area.

Summary: This hotel and room was absolutely beautiful. Beds were very comfy, staff was very friendly and accommodating. Great free breakfast every morning. Clean pool and hot tub. I would highly recommend this hotel! ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️
Manager Response: Thank you for this great reviews. We are so happy that you loved this place as much as we do. We hope you make this your home away from home.

Summary: The room was very clean and very quiet. Our family had the pool to ourselves the majority of the time. The front clerk was very friendly and helpful. We will stay here again in the near future. We definitely recommend it.
Manager Response: We want to be your home away from home. Let us know when you back to the area and will take great care of you or anyone that come our way.

Summary: This was our 1st time staying at a hotel visiting family in California. I would not stay any where else! Can't wait to return just to stay here again! Great great experience! Staff, breakfast, pool, room... all exceeded our expectations!

Clean enough but very basic. Thin walls between rooms allow you to hear conversations. No restaurants or shops within walking distance. Strange decor, not relaxing or especially welcoming. I stay at Hampton a it and this was underwhelming.
Manager Response: Dear Barb c,  Thank you for staying with us. We appreciate your honesty as we look for reviews to provide insight and constructive feedback regarding our hotel’s service and amenities to better our guest experience. We welcome any additional comments or suggestions you would like to share. If you return to our area, we hope you’ll stay with us again.

Summary: Front desk, cleaning staff, and girls at breakfast area were all friendly.  Hotel is new and clean.  Only 5 minutes from Knotts Berry Farm.  Alot of places to eat nearby.  Walls a little thin though.  You could hear the next room talking.  But nice hotel otherwise.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and glad you had a great stay with us!

Summary: Friendly staff.  Super comfy beds.  Breakfast was good but a bit of a madhouse jockeying for position to serve up.  TV is huge, too big in our opinion but I'm really digging to find anything negative to say.  Great hotel and wonderful staff.
Manager Response: Thank you, Thank you! We are super happy you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary: We arrived slightly early and were greeted by a Manager. Who even located a room for us that was clean and ready. Not quit on the floor we wanted but definitely a nice room and that worked for us. Everyone was kind and helpful. A clean and very new location perfect for those visiting the amusement parks near by, as that was what we were in the area for. The bed was nice and comfy almost did not seem like we were away from our own bed.

New hotel in a good location. My only 2 issues is the walls between rooms are thin, I could hear the conversation in the next room, and we had a spider in our room, which for a new hotel is kind of shocking. Other than that, it was ok and the staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sorry to hear about the spider in the room. We have a contract with Ecolab and they do a great job keeping the, out of the hotel. We are also looking into the nosy concern you had.

Summary: Stayed here for one night, this is a brand new Hampton Inn. Beautiful bathroom, and rooms are roomy. Jesse checked us in, very nice and outgoing. Thank you for letting my friend borrow your charger, he went above and beyond to help him. Also complimentary parking and breakfast, which is AWESOME! will def be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and happy to see my staff went out of the way to help our guest. We hope to see you again real soon.

Summary: We visited as a family. The hotel is very clean, modern and nucely decorated. We especially enjoyed the pool and spa. Breakfast was better than most Hamptons. A great base for exploring Southern California.

We stayed for a baseball tournament. There were several teams staying but we couldn't hear anything! Walls are thick, rooms are clean and spacious. We also used the laundry room and it was great and clean.

We had a beautiful room. Very clean  and roomy! Breakfast was pretty good but no staff when we were eating for questions. Very noisy on our trip and staff at night didn’t seem to care how loud it was for everyone
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and glad you enjoyed your trip. I am sorry you didn't see our staff during Breakfast time we have two people working all the time.

Summary: This was an awesome vacation partnered with the smiles and hospitality from the staff of Hamton Inn.  You made us feel very welcome and assisted with any and all needs we had in a timely courteous fashion.

We had an excellent experience. We have used Hampton Inns often and this location did meet my expectations. The staff was extremely helpful, the outdoor seating by the pool area was very enjoyable and the breakfast was great.
Manager Response: Family is the mission here, We treat everyone like family and glad you got to witness that.

Summary: Nice, new hotel located in Buena Park right off the I5 freeway.   We booked our room at a decent rate and there is complementary parking, which is rare nowadays.   The hotel itself is not located in a touristy, resorty area.  There is a Chevron gas station conveniently located right across the street.   On the bright side, since our room faces the gas station we can monitor the gas pricing along with freeway traffic. There are also a bunch of car dealerships in the surrounding area if you are in the market for a new car...Anyways, back to the room review...the room itself is basic but clean, new, and conveniently furnished with both a microwave and refrigerator.   They also have additional seating which is convenient when you are traveling with a family.  The beds are raised

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel. Brand new, very clean.
Summary: Brand new. Quality, service and experience as expected. Staff very helpful. Close to Disney,Knotts and any OC activities. Expect at least an hour drive anywhere else due to LA traffic.Overall very good stay.

Extremely Nice facilities. The rooms are spacious and very comfortable. Everything is new so it makes the stay extra special.  The breakfast buffet is available to all guests. A lot of choices. A different egg, bacon or sausage each day. Waffles are delicious. We highly recommend Hampton Inn and Suites.

New hotel but with experienced staff. Great location for Knotts or Disneyland. Big breakfast area. Nice patio with fire feature. Easy access to I 5 and hwy 91. Clean rooms with energy efficient lighting and appliances.

The hotel was very clean and welcoming. Our room was very clean. The pool was nice. The staff were very friendly and helpful with everything we needed during our stay. The hotel is new, so everything was in great shape. The breakfast was good! Pastries/muffins, waffles, eggs/meat/potatoes, oatmeal, cereal, fruit/yogurt, juice, coffee. We will definitely stay again next time we make a trip to Disney😁

I would recommend this hotel, as the employees are very nice and breakfast was fantastic. Our bed was very comfortable and the shower was awesome too. The atmosphere was nice and im glad for refrigerator and microwave so we can save money and feed our kids instead of going somewhere to eat all the time.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and so happy you enjoyed you stay with us. I am really happy that the staff did a wonderful job, I am very lucky to have this great staff.

Summary: The hotel worked with us since we were in town for a funeral. Very clean hotel and staff was very helpful. The room was great And breakfast was good as well. I will definitely stay here again in the future!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and glad you enjoyed you time here at the Hampton INN & Suites

Summary: This hotel was brand new, so we decided to venture out a bit further from Disneyland than we usually do... there aren’t the usual higher parking fees, but I’ll pay those next time to avoid the paper thin walls in the rooms, we could hear normal conversations in the rooms next to us and the tv sounded like it was on full blast! I have never stayed in a room so noisy! And then to top it off there are no dressers to unpack your stuff in... we had to leave everything in our suitcase all week:( the fridge is a energy saver that barely kept things cold on the highest setting. The new microwave had to be turned on over and over again to heat anything up... on a positive note the bathroom was nice and the water pressure was decent.... I wouldn’t stay here again... I want to sleep at
Manager Response: I am very sorry you didn't get a good night sleep. We are looking into so things to help the Nosie leave. We are running very full and have some younger groups in house so the noisy leave could get high then normal sometime. Again, I apologize for your recent stay at the hotel.

Summary: Love the location! Near every place where we want to be including Porto's😊 Clean,very chic decors Staff were friendly and our requests were granted... Breakfast was delish esp the sausage...will definitely be looking for this place again if we ckme back this area.

We booked this hotel as the wedding reception we were attending was only 3 miles away. I also liked the fact that it's a new hotel and the price was very reasonable.  The rooms are huge!  I guess this is a standard in the area though as Knotsberry farm is practically next door and Disneyland is a short drive away. The bathroom is also big and stocked with Neutrogena toiletries,  fluffy towels and they even had a pack of make up remover wipes.  All rooms have a microwave too.  Breakfast is included and they had waffles,  eggs,  bacon,  and sausages,  flavored yogurt,  basically fare targeted for children.  Coffee and tea are also available all day at the lobby.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and glad you enjoyed your stay! The next time you in the area we are here waiting for you!

Summary: Excellent hotel. Near disney and knotts . Free parking and breakfast. Would definitely stay at this hotel again.All of the staff are really friendly and helpful. The pool is heated . They have a nice fire place to drink coffee.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying and so happy you got to meet my great staff! We will be here for your next visit.

Summary: Nice location and great continental breakfast. Everything was clean. This location worked great for a home base for our sales appointments in the area. Restaurants were near by. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying and we can't wait to see you again soon

Summary: Unfortunately, our room was close to the elevator and the chime on the elevator did not ever seem to stop. The room was  lacking an in-room safe which I think is a huge shortcoming in a tourist area. Service was excellent as was the room otherwise, and breakfast was great.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sorry you were close to the elevator. We do offer safe deposit box at the front desk fo all guest. We hope to see you again.

Summary Heading: Brand New Hotel, Wonderful Staff, Free Parking, Great location for Knott's and Disneyland
Summary: Hotel is brand new and rooms are very nice and comfortable, Staff was great, recomending great restaurants in the area and Breakfast was very nice and easy in lobby area. Would stay here again, Free Parking most hotels in area charge. Minutes to Parks via Carpool lanes.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at our hotel. We hope you make this your home away from home.

Summary: This trip was a nice stay with family.  The hotel is beautiful and great amenities.  However the bed was one of the worst sleeps I’ve ever had.  I’m not quite sure what the issue was, but all of us woke up with sore backs.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sorry to hear about the bed. All the beds are brand new but will looking into that room and that bed.

Summary: EXTREMELY noisy neighbors.  Kids running in room above at 2 am. Noisy hallways. Not the Hilton Experience I'm used too. If you want to get some sleep and rest, consider NOT staying here.  On the other hand, the Front Desk Staff and Breakfast Staff is Very Pleasant!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and sorry to hear about the kids running at 2 am. We are looking into what can be done about the noisy so every guest can have a great stay.

Summary Heading: New hotel, great stay despite small problems
Summary: I stayed here for a week and had a few small complications but the staff was quick to make it better. Breakfast is mediocre, like most hotels, but the beds are so comfortable. We enjoyed our stay and next time will definitely choose the suite. After getting our room upgraded after a problem we realized the suite makes a big difference. I would stay here again and definitely would recommend it to others.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: Fabulous new hotel, close to 5 freeway, helpful & friendly staff, clean spacious rooms. Fire pit close to outdoor pool.  Free parking. Delicious breakfast with good variety.  Restaurants within 15-20 minutes.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us.

Summary Heading: Good and Comfortable hotel with proper amenities
Summary: Good hotel and good people.  service was excellent and i would definitely stay here again.  The team was helpful in every way.  the pool and the fireplace and enough parking really helped.  recommend this hotel to everyone.
Manager Response: Thank you  for staying with us glad you had an awesome stay with us.

Summary: Very new, good price, great location a few minutes away from Disneyland, close to Korea Town so some great food options around. If you stop by I'd recommend going by 85C Cafe. Room was fantastic, breakfast was great. Gotta get one of the waffles.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us amd we hope you make this hotel your home away from home

Summary: We booked due to Knotts Hotel being fully booked and I honestly do not regret a thing.  Our room was so nice and we enjoyed our complimentary breakfast.  Breakfast staff made you feel very welcomed and so accommodating
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we hope to see you soon.

Summary: This was the perfect place to stay while visiting Orange County. Beds were comfortable and the breakfast was fabulous.  The staff we encountered was very friendly and accommodating,  they were working hard to keep the full breakfast neat and tidy. Very clean, especially being a brand new hotel, it should be. The pool looked nice but we weren't able to use in our timeframe. Our family of 5 stayed in a Jr. Suite which was large. The electric/lighting took us a couple of minutes to figure out (room key has to be left in the slot by the door for electric power), but it makes sense. Good luck and we will be back.
